name: Find the Couch
description:
"Find the coach" is an asynchronous multiplayer game for your smartphone.
Two players try to make it through a labyrinth in order to meet in the middle.
In their way are a few riddles they have to overcome by communicating to each other what they see around them.
Player1 has the solutions for Player2's riddles hidden in their part of the labyrinth and vice versa.
